titleStmt.title: Iane Anger her Protection for vvomen To defend them against the scandalous reportes of a late surfeiting louer, and all otherlike Venerians that complaine so to bee ouercloyed with womens kindnesse. Written by Ia: A. Gent.
Protection for vvomen
titleStmt.author: Anger, Jane, fl. 1589.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Iones, and Thomas Orwin,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A protection for vvomen.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
